verses.t: After{G3326} these things{G5023} Jesus{G3588} walked{G4043} in{G1722} Galilee{G3588}: for{G1063} he would{G2309} not{G3756} walk{G4043} in{G1722} Jewry{G3588}, because{G3754} the Jews{G2453} sought{G2212} to kill{G615} him{G846}.
Now{G1161} the Jews'{G2453} feast{G3588} of tabernacles{G3588} was{G2258} at hand{G1451}.

His{G846} brethren{G3588} therefore{G3767} said{G2036} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Depart{G3327} hence{G1782}, and{G2532} go{G5217} into{G1519} Jud√¶a{G3588}, that{G2443} thy{G4675} disciples{G3588} also{G2532} may see{G2334} the works{G3588} that{G3739} thou{G4675} doest{G4160}.

For{G1063} there is no man{G3762} that doeth{G4160} any thing{G5100} in{G1722} secret{G2927}, and{G2532} he{G2212} himself{G846} seeketh{G2212} to be known{G1511} openly{G3954}. If{G1487} thou do{G4160} these things{G5023}, shew{G5319} thyself{G4572} to the world{G3588}.
For{G1063} neither{G3761} did{G4100} his{G846} brethren{G3588} believe{G4100} in{G1519} him{G846}.
Then{G3767} Jesus{G3588} said{G3004} unto them{G846}, My{G1699} time{G3588} is{G3918} not yet{G3768} come{G3918}: but{G1161} your{G5212} time{G2540} is{G2076} alway{G3842} ready{G2092}.

The world{G3588} cannot{G3756} hate{G3404} you{G5209}; but{G1161} me{G1691} it hateth{G3404}, because{G3754} I{G1473} testify{G3140} of{G4012} it{G846}that{G3754} the works{G3588} thereof{G846} are{G2076} evil{G4190}.

Go{G305} ye{G5210} up{G305} unto{G1519} this{G3778} feast{G3588}: I{G1473} go{G305} not{G3768} up{G305} yet{G3768} unto{G1519} this{G3778} feast{G3588}; for{G3754} my{G1699} time{G3588} is{G4137} not yet{G3768} full come{G4137}.

But{G1161} when{G5613} his{G846} brethren{G3588} were gone up{G305}, then{G5119} went{G305} he{G846} also{G2532} up{G305} unto{G1519} the feast{G3588}, not{G3756} openly{G5320}, but{G235} as it were{G5613} in{G1722} secret{G2927}.
Then{G3767} the Jews{G2453} sought{G2212} him{G846} at{G1722} the feast{G3588}, and{G2532} said{G3004}, Where{G4226} is{G2076} he{G1565}?

Howbeit{G3305} no man{G3762} spake{G2980} openly{G3954} of{G4012} him{G846} for{G1223} fear{G3588} of the Jews{G2453}.
Now{G2235} about the midst{G3322} of the feast{G3588} Jesus{G3588} went up{G305} into{G1519} the temple{G3588}, and{G2532} taught{G1321}.
And{G2532} the Jews{G2453} marvelled{G2296}, saying{G3004}, How{G4459} knoweth{G1492} this man{G3778} letters{G1121}, having{G3129} never{G3361} learned{G3129}?
Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} them{G846}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, My{G1699} doctrine{G1322} is{G2076} not{G3756} mine{G1699}, but{G235} his that sent{G3992} me{G3165}.

If{G1437} any man{G5100} will{G2309} do{G4160} his{G846} will{G3588}, he shall know{G1097} of{G4012} the doctrine{G3588}, whether{G4220} it be{G2076} of{G1537} God{G3588}, or{G2228} whether I{G1473} speak{G2980} of{G575} myself{G1683}.

He that speaketh{G2980} of{G575} himself{G1438} seeketh{G2212} his own{G2398} glory{G3588}: but{G1161} he that seeketh{G2212} his{G3992} glory{G3588} that sent{G3992} him{G846}, the same{G3778} is{G2076} true{G227}, and{G2532} no{G3756} unrighteousness{G93} is{G2076} in{G1722} him{G846}.

Did{G1325} not{G3756} Moses{G3475} give{G1325} you{G5213} the law{G3588}, and{G2532} yet none{G3762} of{G1537} you{G5216} keepeth{G4160} the law{G3588}? Why{G5101} go ye about{G2212} to kill{G615} me{G3165}?
The people{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, Thou hast{G2192} a devil{G1140}: who{G5101} goeth about{G2212} to kill{G615} thee{G4571}?

Moses{G3475} therefore{G1223} gave{G1325} unto you{G5213} circumcision{G3588}; (not{G3756} because{G3754} it is{G2076} of{G1537} Moses{G3588}, but{G235} of{G1537} the fathers{G3588};) and{G2532} ye{G4059} on{G1722} the sabbath day{G4521} circumcise{G4059} a man{G444}.

If{G1487} a man{G444} on{G1722} the sabbath day{G4521} receive{G2983} circumcision{G4061}, that{G2443} the law{G3588} of Moses{G3475} should{G3089} not{G3361} be broken{G3089}; are ye angry{G5520} at me{G1698}, because{G3754} I have made{G4160} a man{G444} every whit{G3650} whole{G5199} on{G1722} the sabbath day{G4521}?

Then{G3767} said{G3004} some{G5100} of{G1537} them of Jerusalem{G3588}, Is{G2076} not{G3756} this{G3778} he{G2076}, whom{G3739} they seek{G2212} to kill{G615}?

But{G2532}, lo{G1492}, he speaketh{G2980} boldly{G3954}, and{G2532} they say{G3004} nothing{G3762} unto him{G846}. Do{G3379} the rulers{G3588} know{G1097} indeed{G230} that{G3754} this{G3778} is{G2076} the very{G230} Christ{G3588}?
Howbeit{G235} we know{G1492} this man{G5126} whence{G4159} he is{G2076}: but{G1161} when{G3752} Christ{G5547} cometh{G2064}, no man{G3762} knoweth{G1097} whence{G4159} he is{G2076}.

Then{G3767} cried{G2896} Jesus{G3588} in{G1722} the temple{G3588} as he taught{G1321}, saying{G3004}, Ye{G1492} both{G2504} know{G1492} me{G2504}, and{G2532} ye know{G1492} whence{G4159} I am{G1510}: and{G2532} I am{G2064} not{G3756} come{G2064} of{G575} myself{G1683}, but{G235} he that sent{G3992} me{G3165} is{G2076} true{G228}, whom{G3739} ye{G5210} know{G1492} not{G3756}.
But{G1161} I{G1473} know{G1492} him{G846}: for{G3754} I am{G1510} from{G3844} him{G846}, and he{G2548} hath sent{G649} me{G3165}.

Then{G3767} they sought{G2212} to take{G4084} him{G846}: but{G2532} no man{G3762} laid{G1911} hands{G3588} on{G1909} him{G846}, because{G3754} his{G846} hour{G3588} was{G2064} not yet{G3768} come{G2064}.

And{G1161} many{G4183} of{G1537} the people{G3588} believed{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846}, and{G2532} said{G3004}, When{G3752} Christ{G3588} cometh{G2064}, will he do{G4160} more{G4119} miracles{G4592} than these{G5130} which{G3739} this{G3778} man hath done{G4160}?

The Pharisees{G3588} heard{G191} that{G1111} the people{G3588} murmured{G1111} such things{G5023} concerning{G4012} him{G846}; and{G2532} the Pharisees{G3588} and{G2532} the chief priests{G3588} sent{G649} officers{G5257} to{G2443} take{G4084} him{G846}.

Then{G3767} said{G2036} Jesus{G3588} unto them{G846}, Yet{G2089} a little{G3398} while{G5550} am I{G1510} with{G3326}you{G5216}, and{G2532} then I go{G5217} unto{G4314} him that sent{G3992} me{G3165}.
Ye shall seek{G2212} me{G3165}, and{G2532} shall{G2147} not{G3756} find{G2147} me: and{G2532} where{G3699} I{G1473} am{G1510}, thither ye{G5210} cannot{G3756} come{G2064}.

Then{G3767} said{G2036} the Jews{G2453} among{G4314} themselves{G1438}, Whither{G4226} will{G3195} he{G3778} go{G4198}, that{G3754} we{G2249} shall{G2147} not{G3756} find{G2147} him{G846}? will he{G3195} go{G4198} unto{G1519} the dispersed{G3588} among the Gentiles{G3588}, and{G2532} teach{G1321} the Gentiles{G3588}?

What{G5101} manner of saying{G3588} is{G2076} this{G3778} that{G3739} he said{G2036}, Ye shall seek{G2212} me{G3165}, and{G2532} shall{G2147} not{G3756} find{G2147} me: and{G2532} where{G3699} I{G1473} am{G1510}, thither ye{G5210} cannot{G3756} come{G2064}?

In{G1722} the last{G2078} day{G2250}, that{G3588} great{G3173} day of the feast{G3588}, Jesus{G3588} stood{G2476} and{G2532} cried{G2896}, saying{G3004}, If{G1437} any man{G5100} thirst{G1372}, let him come{G2064} unto{G4314} me{G3165}, and{G2532} drink{G4095}.

He that believeth{G4100} on{G1519} me{G1691}, as{G2531} the scripture{G3588} hath said{G2036}, out of{G1537} his{G846} belly{G3588} shall flow{G4482} rivers{G4215} of{G5204} living{G2198} water{G5204}.

(But{G1161} this{G5124} spake he{G2036} of{G4012} the Spirit{G3588}, which{G3739} they that believe{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846} should{G3195} receive{G2983}: for{G1063} the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} was{G2258} not yet{G3768} given; because that{G3754} Jesus{G3588} was{G1392} not yet{G3764} glorified{G1392}.)
Many{G4183} of{G1537} the people{G3588} therefore{G3767}, when they heard{G191} this saying{G3588}, said{G3004}, Of a truth{G230} this{G3778} is{G2076} the Prophet{G3588}.
Others{G243} said{G3004}, This{G3778} is{G2076} the Christ{G3588}. But{G1161} some{G243} said{G3004}, Shall{G3361} Christ{G3588} come{G2064} out of{G1537} Galilee{G3588}?

Hath{G2036} not{G3780} the scripture{G3588} said{G2036}, That{G3754} Christ{G3588} cometh{G2064} of{G1537} the seed{G3588} of David{G1138}, and{G2532} out{G575} of the town{G3588} of Bethlehem{G965}, where{G3699} David{G1138} was{G2258}?
So{G3767} there was{G1096} a division{G4978} among{G1722} the people{G3588} because{G1223} of him{G846}.
And{G1161} some{G5100} of{G1537} them{G846} would have{G2309} taken{G4084} him{G846}; but{G235} no man{G3762} laid{G1911} hands{G3588} on{G1909} him{G846}.

Then{G3767} came{G2064} the officers{G3588} to{G4314} the chief priests{G3588} and{G2532} Pharisees{G5330}; and{G2532} they{G1565} said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Why{G1223} have ye{G71} not{G3756} brought{G71} him{G846}?
The officers{G3588} answered{G611}, Never{G3763} man{G444} spake{G2980} like{G5613} this{G3778} man{G3588}.
Then{G3767} answered{G611} them{G846} the Pharisees{G3588}, Are{G4105} ye{G5210} also{G3361} deceived{G4105}?
Have{G4100} any{G5100} of{G1537} the rulers{G3588} or{G2228} of{G1537} the Pharisees{G3588} believed{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846}?
But{G235} this{G3778} people{G3588} who knoweth{G1097} not{G3361} the law{G3588} are{G1526} cursed{G1944}.
Nicodemus{G3530} saith{G3004} unto{G4314} them{G846}, (he that came{G2064} to{G4314} Jesus{G846} by night{G3571}, being{G5607} one{G1520} of{G1537} them{G846},)
Doth our{G2257} law{G3588} judge{G2919} any man{G3588}, before{G4386} it hear{G191} him{G846}, and{G2532} know{G1097} what{G5101} he doeth{G4160}?

They answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Art{G1488} thou{G4771} also{G2532} of{G1537} Galilee{G3588}? Search{G2045}, and{G2532} look{G1492}: for{G3754} out of{G1537} Galilee{G3588} ariseth{G1453} no{G3756} prophet{G4396}.
And{G2532} every man{G1538} went{G4198} unto{G1519} his own{G846} house{G3588}.
